messages.title: Lucy Powell: 'I'll Fight For Our Services'
messages.content: Labour’s Lucy Powell this month launches her campaign to protect local services under threat from Tory cuts.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Fighting to protect local services like Sure Start Children's Centres from cuts proposed by a Tory government.

quotes.text: Voters have a clear choice at the next election. A Tory Government would mean cuts to local services. Sure Start Childrens Centres are top of their list. There are tough choices to be made to get public funds on track, but targeting local families is not the answer. I'll stand up for Sure Start and local services.

images.caption: Lucy Powell with a group of supporters holding a 'Save Sure Start' banner.

leaflet.additionalNotes: To support Lucy’s campaign, sign our form inside.
